title: Failed to build bazel@0.4.5
body:
I failed to build bazel@0.4.5. It seeems that restrion on SPACK environment leads to this issue. I haven't tried higher versions of baze since patches in Spack don't apply to them.

### Expected Result

Spack builds bazel.

### Actual Result

Spack fails to build bazel.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install --restage --keep-stage bazel@0.4.5 %gcc@4.8.5
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/bash' '-c' './compile.sh'

2 errors found in build log:
     1     ==> Executing phase: 'install'
     2     ==> '/usr/bin/bash' '-c' './compile.sh'
     3     INFO: You can skip this first step by providing a path to the bazel binary as second argument:
     4     INFO:    ./compile.sh compile /path/to/bazel
     5     🍃  Building Bazel from scratch.......
     6     🍃  Building Bazel with Bazel.
  >> 7     .WARNING: /tmp/bazel_OlYUsA3S/out/external/bazel_tools/WORKSPACE:1: Workspace name in /tmp/bazel_OlYUsA3
S/out/external/bazel_tools/WORKSPACE (@io_bazel) does not match the name given in the repository's definition (@baz
el_tools); this will cause a build error in future versions.
     8     INFO: Loading package: src
INFO: Loading package: @bazel_tools//tools/cpp
INFO: Loading package: @local_config_xcode//
INFO: Loading package: @local_config_cc//
INFO: Loading complete.  Analyzing...
INFO: Loading package: src/main/cpp
     [ ... ]
INFO: Loading package: src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/rules/objc
INFO: Loading package: third_party/java/dd_plist
INFO: Found 1 target...
     45    INFO: Building...
[0 / 4] BazelWorkspaceStatusAction stable-status.txt
[1 / 80] Writing file src/main/tools/linux-sandbox-2.params
  >> 48    ERROR: /tmp/stage/bazel-0.4.5-f3gth4g4lclx5t5tlteubwmqicyiraqi/spack-expanded-archive/third_party/zlib/B
UILD:9:1: C++ compilation of rule '//third_party/zlib:zlib' failed: gcc failed: error executing command
     49      (cd /tmp/bazel_OlYUsA3S/out/execroot/spack-expanded-archive && \
     49      (cd /tmp/bazel_OlYUsA3S/out/execroot/spack-expanded-archive && \
     50      exec env - \
     51        PATH=/lustre/home/rpm/spack/lib/spack/env:/lustre/home/rpm/spack/lib/spack/env/case-insensitive:/lus
tre/home/rpm/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc:/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/jdk-8u141-b15-y6l4xaepdukhu
xn3vxb7mo26pqmcb6ln/bin:/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zip-3.0-v4kyuwbfv5bmk2tmaehtw6sfbyzxd3bu
/bin:/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/jdk-8u141-b15-y6l4xaepdukhuxn3vxb7mo26pqmcb6ln/bin:/lustre/
spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zip-3.0-v4kyuwbfv5bmk2tmaehtw6sfbyzxd3bu/bin:/lustre/home/rpm/spack/opt/
spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/emacs-25.2-edwvawy74vmnlreyhpmklea4wtspidth/bin:/lustre/home/rpm/spack/opt/spa
ck/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/vim-8.0.0503-rgrjdp7csudv3mrzogn4jzp4nbzq3cwo/bin:/lustre/home/rpm/spack/opt/spac
k/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/git-2.13.0-teo6pgh75rd7skox475lpxn4vpwamidt/bin:/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-
x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/emacs-25.1-k5preh7xr6tciuhbf2t42dj5ennepor5/bin:/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5
/vim-8.0.0454-xtcruaifuuhpphx7f6xemckfxzvsndbo/bin:/lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/git-2.11.1-e7
v4kntbejmkop6skw3xruykfb2x44f3/bin:/opt/puppetlabs/bin:/lustre/home/rpm/spack/bin:/lustre/home/rpm/.local/bin:/lust
re/home/rpm/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/lustre/home/rpm/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sb
in:/opt/puppetlabs/bin \
     52        SPACK_CC=/usr/bin/gcc \
     53        SPACK_CC_RPATH_ARG=-Wl,-rpath, \
     54        SPACK_COMPILER_SPEC=gcc@4.8.5 \
...

$ tail /lustre/home/rpm/spack/var/spack/stage/bazel-0.4.5-f3gth4g4lclx5t5tlteubwmqicyiraqi/spack-expanded-archive/spack-build.out   
  /lustre/home/rpm/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fstack-protector -Wall -B/lustre/home/rpm/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc -B/usr/bin -Wunused-but-set-parameter -Wno-free-nonheap-object -fno-omit-frame-pointer -g0 -O2 '-D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=1' -DNDEBUG -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -MD -MF bazel-out/local-opt/bin/third_party/zlib/_objs/zlib/third_party/zlib/inftrees.d -iquote . -iquote bazel-out/local-opt/genfiles -iquote external/bazel_tools -iquote bazel-out/local-opt/genfiles/external/bazel_tools -isystem third_party/zlib -isystem bazel-out/local-opt/genfiles/third_party/zlib -isystem external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/gcc3 -w -fno-canonical-system-headers -Wno-builtin-macro-redefined '-D__DATE__="redacted"' '-D__TIMESTAMP__="redacted"' '-D__TIME__="redacted"' -c third_party/zlib/inftrees.c -o bazel-out/local-opt/bin/third_party/zlib/_objs/zlib/third_party/zlib/inftrees.o): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
Spack compiler must be run from Spack! Input 'SPACK_DEBUG_LOG_ID' is missing.
[1 / 107] Writing file src/main/protobuf/libdeps_java_proto.jar-2.params
[1 / 128] Writing file src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/libskylarki\
nterface.jar-2.params
Target //src:bazel failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 9.337s, Critical Path: 0.30s

ERROR: Could not build Bazel
```
[spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1516349/spack-build.env.txt)
[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1516350/spack-build.out.txt)

### Information on your system

 I am using CentOS 7, not sure this issue can be reproduced on other platforms. GCC compiler (gcc@4.8.5) in use is from CentOS 7, not from Spack.
